entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is trying to cast a spell to defend himself against a dementor.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dark creature that is attacking Harry and sucking out his happiness.

entities.name: patronum
entities.description: A spell that Harry is trying to cast to defend himself against the dementor.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: An object used by wizards to cast spells, which Harry uses to try and cast the Patronum spell.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to cast the Patronum spell to defend himself against the dementor.
Harry uses his wand to try and cast the Patronum spell.
